mapper.insert: INSERT INTO targethistory(target_id,target_name,target_weight,papers_id) SELECT t.target_id,t.target_name,ROUND(ps.target_allweight/( select sum(target_allweight) as target_Num from paperstarget where papers_id = #{papers_Id})*100,2) as taget_weight,ps.papers_id FROM target as t join paperstarget as ps on t.target_id = ps.target_id where ps.papers_id = #{papers_Id}

insert into optionshistory (papers_id,target_id,options_id,options_content,options_weight) select ps.papers_id,ps.target_id,op.options_id,op.options_content,op.options_weight from (options as op join targetoptions as tao on op.options_id = tao.options_id )join paperstarget as ps on tao.target_id = ps.target_id where ps.papers_id = #{papers_Id}
